body_html: You probably have both an old and new version of cudnn on your machine and your search path LD_LIBRARY_PATH is finding the old one. Read the manual on LD_DEBUG so you can trace what libraries are loading (use grep with it)
body_text: You probably have both an old and new version of cudnn on your machine and your search path LD_LIBRARY_PATH is finding the old one. Read the manual on LD_DEBUG so you can trace what libraries are loading (use grep with it)
body: You probably have both an old and new version of cudnn on your machine and your search path LD_LIBRARY_PATH is finding the old one. Read the manual on LD_DEBUG so you can trace what libraries are loading (use grep with it)
